name: turkey-neighbourhoods
description: Always up to date names of cities, districts and neighbourhoods in Turkey.

scripts.test: for i in tests/*.js; do node "$i"; done
scripts.update-extra: node generators/extra/neighbourhoods.js && node generators/extra/zipcodes.js && node generators/extra/cities.js && node generators/extra/districts.js && node generators/extra/plates.js && node generators/extra/cityPlates.js
scripts.update-all: npm run update-core && npm run update-extra
